event.title: The FSFE Community Meeting 2019 in Bolzano, Italy

body.p: The FSFE will run its Annual Community meeting for 2019 in cooperation with the SFScon- one of Europeâ€™s most established Annual Conferences on Free Software, happening every in November in Bolzano, Italy. On Saturday, November 16, there will be a public FSFE-track in the morning, and our internal workshops and sessions during the afternoon. There will be social activities in the evening and you can find all up-to-date information on the dedicated wiki-page.
